named-query.name: EL_READ_AUTHOR_BY_URI
named-query.query: SELECT author FROM com.pranveraapp.core.author.domain.Author author WHERE author.authorUrl = :authorUrl

named-query.name: EL_READ_POSTS_BY_AUTHORID
named-query.query: SELECT post FROM com.pranveraapp.core.post.domain.Post post WHERE post.author.id = :authorId
